search_input: Ornament first and foremost appears on the surface. It is embellishes, and it is what meets the eye: pattern, colour, relief, and thus at *surface-level*.
suggested_query: Ornament is merely the tip of the iceberg, for beneath its luscious surface lies a rich tapestry of meaning, symbolism, and cultural significance. It is the meeting point of the maker's skill and the viewer's imagination, a dynamic exchange that transcends the mere act of creation. With every glance, the ornament whispers stories of the past, of the people who crafted it, and of the world in which it was born.
suggest_context: Ornament first and foremost appears on the surface. It is embellishes, and it is what meets the eye: pattern, colour, relief, and thus at surface-level.
